title: Secretariat
description: The life of champion racehorse Secretariat. He’s tired of running in circles.
quote: Now I’ve finally realized a triple hug is way more valuable than a Triple Crown.
altHero: BoJack Horseman as Secretariat, wearing a jersey in a locker room
alt1: Secretariat talks to his trainer (Corduroy Jackson-Jackson)
alt2: Secretariat group hugs two kids and a baby horse
alt3: Secretariat meets with Richard Nixon in the Oval Office
alt4: Secretariat sits backwards on a chair and talks with some teens
